text: Showdown at Abilene is a 1956 American Western film directed by Charles Haas. It was remade as Gunfight in Abilene. ==Cast== *Jock Mahoney as Jim Trask *Martha Hyer as Peggy Bigelow *Lyle Bettger as Dave Mosely *David Janssen as Verne Ward *Grant Williams as Chip Tomlin *Ted de Corsia as Dan Claudius *Lane Bradford as Loop ==External links== *Showdown at Abilene at IMDb *Showdown at Abeline at TCMDB Category:1957 films Category:Films directed by Charles F. Haas
title: Showdown at Abilene
